author: Special Correspondent
text: Virudhunagar district administration has sought applications from ex-servicemen interested in bandobust duty during the Assembly elections. In a statement, District Election Officer and Collector V. Rajaraman said that ex-servicemen would be deployed for security duty on the polling day (May 16). They would be given remuneration. Those in possession of uniform could register their names by producing their original discharge certificate and identity card to the Assistant Director, Ex-Servicemen Welfare, Srivilliputtur, he said.
title: Ex-servicemen for poll duty
